==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|郎|子}}

===Etymology===
/iratuko<sub>1</sub>/ → /iratuko/. Compound of {{m|ja|いら|tr=ira||kinship}}, {{m|ja|つ|tr=tsu|pos=genitive marker}}, and {{m|ja|子|tr=ko<sub>1</sub>||male}}.

===Pronunciation===
* {{IPA|[iratsuko]|lang=ja}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|いらつこ}}

# a familiar or friendly term for a young man

* {{l|ja|郎女}} (iratsume)
